msbt.message: Oh man! You surprised me! You got stung by a wasp, didn't you? Yikes!
Wow, um, yikes. Your face is looking rough. Did a wasp get ya?Man, wasps are nice guys, but ya can't be getting up in their buzzness, ! <10_4 />Get it?!
Your face looks It looks really painful! I feel ya. I get stung all the time.No worries, though. It'll heal with time, or right away with medicine!
Your face looks like it hurts. Yeah, don't pick fights with wasps. Wasps are nice, but they'll fight.No worries, though! Here, it'll heal right away with this medicine!
I get stung a bunch too, so I always try to carry medicine with me. And also 'cause it tastes like blue!
Oh man! You surprised me! You got stung by a wasp, didn't you? Yikes!
Oh! I know! I've got a medicine that could help you get better!
It's a super easy medicine recipe. I learned it when I was smaller than I am right now.If you make a bunch and carry it around with ya, then you're always ready to fix your wrong parts!
